wikipedia_page.main: Peter John Randall,  (20 August 1930 – 23 April 2007) was a British Army soldier and a recipient of the George Medal, and the RSPCA's Margaret Wheatley Cross, for his actions on 8 October 1954 where he saved the life of a fellow soldier and a military dog from a burning truck.

response: * Peter Randall (British Army soldier) (1930–2007), British Army sergeant and recipient of the George Medal
* William Peter Randall (born 1964), aka W. Peter Randall, musician and politician from Canada
* General Peter Randall, a fictional character in the video game Prototype
